Introduction

This repo contains my course project to Coursera "Getting And Cleaning Data" course that is part of Data Science specialization.

1. There is one script called run_analysis.R. 
2. It contains all needed steps as needed as per project instructions
3. It downloads the UCI HAR zip data files from the specified URL and unzips the data under folder "/WearData"
4. It makes the necessary transformations and creates tidy data as spefied by the project instructions
5. CodeBook.md explains the code for various steps in details
6. To run this script, clone this repo and execute the script from prompt
